Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires utility companies to report on utility poles and remove unused utility poles in the public right-of-way
Summary: Requires utility companies to report on utility poles and remove unused utility poles in the public right-of-way.
LawCode: Add ยง119-e, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring utility companies to report on utility poles and remove unused utility poles in the public right-of-way
